mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name as product_name, p.qnt, p.price, p.cost, c.name as category_name, p.box_qnt, p.exp, p.product_code, p.brand, p.detail, p.imgname FROM product p INNER JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE c.name =#{categoryname};
